item.description: 我是纽约的经济编辑莫莉-史密斯。今天我们将探讨美国通胀的朦胧前景。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Molly Smith, an economics editor in New York. item.title: 德国中型企业将从 Merz 的一揽子投资计划中获益匪浅
item.description: 德国计划进行的财政改革将有利于该国更多面向国内的中型工业股票。【原文：Germany’s planned fiscal reform would be a boon for the country’s more domestically-oriented industrial mid-cap stocks.】

item.title: 交易员已开始押注俄罗斯债券即将回归
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 06:33。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:33 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 欧洲养老基金准备取消对国防股的长期禁令
item.description: 欧洲几家养老基金正在审查长期以来对武器制造商的排斥政策，同时努力更新其投资组合，以适应当前的政治形势。【原文：Several pension funds in Europe are reviewing long-standing exclusion policies on weapons manufacturers, as they work to update their portfolios to match the political moment.】

item.title: 苹果股价失去避风港魅力，逆风阻挡多头
item.description: 多年来，投资者一直将苹果公司视为市场动荡时期的潜在安全港。这一次，这种说法没有得到证实。【原文：For years, investors have talked of Apple Inc. as a potential port of safety in times of market turmoil. That hasn’t been borne out this time around.】

item.title: 贝莱德、投资者向陷入困境的聚合器 Razor 注入资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，包括贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Investors including BlackRock Inc. have agreed to provide another loan of at least $15 million to Razor Group, according to people familiar with the matter, as the German e-commerce brand aggregator attempts to stave off a liquidity crunch.】

item.title: 财大气粗的美团希望在香港的胜利基础上再接再厉
item.description: 香港居民西蒙-苗（Simon Miao）在疫情期间订阅了 Deliveroo 的食品配送服务，但后来他取消了订阅，因为最高 98 港元（约合 12.61 美元）的月费并没有带来多少好处。【原文：Simon Miao, a Hong Kong resident, signed up for a food-delivery subscription with Deliveroo during the pandemic, but he later canceled it because the monthly fee, which tops out at HK$98 ($12.61), didn’t bring many perks.】

item.title: CIBC 任命哈里-库勒姆（Harry Culham）为下一任首席执行官。
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）任命哈里-库勒姆（Harry Culham）接替首席执行官维克多-多迪格（Victor Dodig）。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce appointed Harry Culham to succeed Chief Executive Officer Victor Dodig, who will retire in November after leading the nation’s fifth-largest lender for more than a decade.】

item.title: OpenAI 请求白宫免除各州人工智能规则的限制
item.description: OpenAI 要求特朗普政府帮助人工智能公司免受越来越多的州政府法规的限制，如果这些公司自愿与联邦政府分享其模型的话。【原文：OpenAI has asked the Trump administration to help shield artificial intelligence companies from a growing number of proposed state regulations if they voluntarily share their models with the federal government.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行不再认为挪威会在今年或明年降息
item.description: 北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank Abp）分析师表示，由于通胀率高于预期和登记失业率下降，挪威央行明年可能不会降息。【原文：Norway’s central bank will probably refrain from interest rate cuts through next year due to faster-than-expected inflation and a decline in registered unemployment, according to analysts at Nordea Bank Abp.】

item.title: 滞胀交易成为美国股市下跌中的罕见赢家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发动的关税战已持续第三周，引发了股市溃败，在这种情况下，几乎没有什么制胜的策略可供选择。不过，现在有一种策略正在飙升：在经济陷入滞胀的情况下，押注于股票的配对交易。【原文：There have been few winning strategies to seek refuge in as the stock rout sparked by President Donald Trump’s start-stop tariff war drags on for a third week. One, though, is soaring right now: a pair trade that bets on stocks that thrives in an economy sinking into stagflation.】

item.title: 沙特阿美四月份对华石油销售量将大幅下降
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）将向中国供应至少 10 个月来最低数量的石油，甚至可能更久。【原文：Saudi Aramco is set to supply the lowest amount of oil to China in at least 10 months, and possibly much longer.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "小费免税 "政策会给工人阶级带来怎样的负面影响？
item.description: 历史告诉我们，当减税政策偏向于一种收入而非另一种收入时，更有可能导致不正常的结果。【原文：History tells us that tax cuts are more likely to lead to perverse results when they favor one kind of income over another.】

item.title: 国际能源署称俄罗斯石油出口几乎未受影响，但价格受到冲击
item.description: 据国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）称，在美国实施最新一轮制裁后，俄罗斯 2 月份的石油出口量有所下降，但价格折扣的扩大抑制了石油收入。【原文：Russian oil exports edged lower in February following the imposition of the latest round of US sanctions, but widening price discounts curbed revenues, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 国际能源署（IEA）称，贸易战削弱石油需求，欧佩克+增加供应
item.description: 国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）表示，全球石油需求正受到贸易战升级的压力，与此同时，欧佩克+（OPEC+）正在恢复产量，有可能加深供应过剩。【原文：Global oil demand is under pressure from the escalating trade war at the same time that OPEC+ is reviving output, threatening to deepen a supply surplus, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 通用汽车韩国工会领导人在特朗普关税忧虑中前往美国
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors Co.）韩国工厂的工会工人对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统酝酿中的关税表示担忧，他们担心，如果他们工作的工厂（向美国运送数千辆汽车）关闭或受到某种影响，他们可能会失去工作。【原文：Unionized workers at General Motors Co. plants in South Korea have expressed concerns over President Donald Trump’s mooted tariffs, worried they may lose their jobs if the factories they work at, which ship thousands of cars to the US, close or are impacted in some way.】

item.title: 美国数据公布前贸易紧张局势加剧，欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 由于关税紧张局势持续升温，投资者等待美国数据为利率走势提供线索，欧洲股市走低。【原文：European stocks edged lower as tariff tensions continued to rise and investors awaited US data for clues on the path of interest rates.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克斯称通胀问题仍需努力
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克斯（Martins Kazaks）表示，与通胀的斗争尚未结束，但在不确定性升高的情况下，他没有对利率走势给出倾向性意见。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said the battle with inflation is not yet over but steered clear of giving preferences for the path of interest rates amid elevated uncertainty.】

item.title: 纳格尔告诉英国广播公司：欧洲央行将在年底回到 2% 的目标水平
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）告诉英国广播公司（BBC），欧元区通胀率将在2025年底前恢复到2%的目标。【原文：Euro-area inflation will return to the European Central Bank’s 2% target by the end of 2025, Governing Council member Joachim Nagel told the BBC.】

item.title: Vnet 寻求在 2030 年到期的可转换债券中筹资 4 亿美元
item.description: 中国数据中心运营商 Vnet 集团公司将发行 4 亿美元的可转换债券，到期日为 2030 年 4 月 1 日。【原文：Chinese data-center operator Vnet Group Inc. is offering $400 million in convertible bonds maturing April 1, 2030.】

item.title: 据称，随着对国防领域兴趣的增加，Advent 将考虑出售 Ultra PCS
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，随着国防相关资产需求的激增，Advent International 正处于探索收购 Ultra Precision Control Systems 公司的早期阶段。【原文：Advent International is in the early stages of exploring options for Ultra Precision Control Systems, people familiar said, as demand booms for defense-related assets.】

item.title: 保留外部董事的日产领导层调整招致怒火
item.description: 日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co., NISSAN）的领导层改组因不够深入而招致批评，这促使一些人怀疑这家陷入困境的日本汽车制造商对于解决其财务问题和确保其未来稳定的合作伙伴的重视程度。【原文：Nissan Motor Co.’s leadership reshuffle has drawn criticism for not going far enough, prompting some to wonder how serious the beleaguered Japanese carmaker is about fixing its finances and securing a partner that would ensure its future stability.】

item.title: 土耳其货币局局长誓言在 "强劲 "增长后采取紧缩立场
item.description: 土耳其央行行长法提赫-卡拉汉（Fatih Karahan）在连续三次降息后对国家媒体表示，在经济增长 "强劲 "和需求前景不明朗的情况下，土耳其央行将保持紧缩立场。【原文：Turkey’s central bank will keep a tight stance after “powerful” economic growth and with the outlook for demand murky, Governor Fatih Karahan said to state media, following three consecutive interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚通胀在政治风险中走高
item.description: 罗马尼亚上月通胀率意外走高，这可能强化了央行在 5 月总统选举前因物价压力和政治风险而采取的货币宽松观望态度。【原文：Romanian inflation unexpectedly edged higher last month, likely reinforcing a central bank wait-and-see approach to monetary easing due to price pressures and political risks before presidential elections in May.】

item.title: 德意志银行奖金因交易和交易而增至十年新高
item.description: 去年，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）交易员和交易员的奖金增长了近三分之一，该银行的浮动薪酬总额也达到了十年来的最高水平。【原文：Bonuses for Deutsche Bank AG’s traders and dealmakers grew by almost a third for last year, as the lender increased its overall variable pay pool to the most in a decade.】

item.title: 麦格理称第三季度黄金或涨至 3,500 美元
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group）的分析师认为，黄金的避险魅力不断增强，可能会使其在第三季度飙升至每盎司 3500 美元的历史新高。【原文：Gold’s burgeoning safe-haven allure may see it surge to a record high of $3,500 an ounce during the third quarter, according to Macquarie Group analysts.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴推出人工智能代理应用，力争赶超竞争对手
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）发布了新版人工智能助手移动应用程序，其中纳入了最新的内部模型，这是该公司推出的一系列产品中的又一款，旨在帮助公司跟上中国人工智能竞争对手的步伐。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. unveiled a new version of its AI assistant mobile app that incorporates its latest in-house model, another in a series of product rollouts intended to help the company keep pace with Chinese artificial intelligence rivals.】

item.title: 外资抢购中国银行债务或将提升人民币防卫能力
item.description: 中国的债券抛售为外国投资者创造了机会，他们可以用美元换取更具吸引力的人民币短期银行债务，并在无意中加强了中国政府对本国货币的支持。【原文：China’s bond selloff is creating pockets of opportunity for foreign investors, who can swap dollars for more attractive yuan-denominated short-term bank debt — and inadvertently bolster Beijing’s support of its currency.】
